summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3814 for the improvement of Orcas Street from 32nd Avenue South to Empire Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46906, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
